nodes.text: The Ax-25 blaster cannon was a model of blaster cannon produced by BlasTech Industries. The C-PH patrol speeder bikes produced by the Aratech Repulsor Company for the Galactic Empire were equipped with a single forward fixed Ax-25.

The Ax-25 blaster cannon was created for the 2018 film Solo: A Star Wars Story and was revealed earlier in the year in the first trailer released for it. The weapon received identification in the reference book Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, written by Pablo Hidalgo and released in conjunction with Solo.
